rows.label: tev023401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev023401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Pauline about the infrastructure of NLA.

rows.label: tev023401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev023401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Pauline about recent developments.

rows.label: tev023401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Pauline about the infrastructure of NLA.

rows.label: tev023401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Pauline about her experiences with the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev023401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Pauline about the citizens of NLA.

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0001
rows.name:
For those of us in the restaurant business, the nearest
and dearest piece of infrastructure is the integrated
production plant in the industrial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0002
rows.name:
All of the Earth-style foodstuffs distributed throughout
New LA are made there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Until the plant was up and running, all we had to
eat were the emergency rations that had been loaded
onto the Whale. ...It was a bad time for morale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0004
rows.name:
But when the plant was finally put into service,
the foods we lived for went back on the menu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'm talking pancakes, hamburgers, and pizza!
All the comfort foods that our American souls yearn for![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0010
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Hmm? Oh, sorry. I was just praying and I kind of...
spaced out for a minute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0012
rows.name:
I work at the restaurant just over there.
We get a lot of BLADEs like yourself as customers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0013
rows.name:
Including lots of regulars who do nothing but vent at
me about their work problems all day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0014
rows.name: Aw, but I don't mind. They're all such cute kids.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0015
rows.name:
Anyway, I was saying a prayer for all of my kids who
were called to duty outside the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0016
rows.name:
A prayer that they make it back safely so I can fill their
bellies with my hamburger special once more![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0022
rows.name:
I was curious how the integrated production plant
makes all of the Earth foods we eat, so I went
down there for a tour.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0023
rows.name:
I couldn't believe it! For example, you know that zesian
fleawort grass that grows wild everywhere on Mira?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0024
rows.name:
Well they just shovel that into some strange machine,
and it comes out the other side as bread and meat
and whatever else they want![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0025
rows.name: I can't begin to imagine how that works.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0026
rows.name:
They said something about the machine rearranging
compositional elements, but at that point my eyes kind
of glazed over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0027
rows.name:
Anyway, the more plants and flowers they have as raw
materials, the wider the variety of items they can make.
We need to get our BLADEs focused on that, pronto![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0039
rows.name:
I guess they haven't had a lot of good things to eat
before now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0040
rows.name:
All of the Ma-non who come to my restaurant seem
moved nearly to tears by our human food.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0041
rows.name:
The strange thing is, they seem to like really strong
flavorsâ€”so they slather their pancakes with ketchup
and pour gobs of hot sauce on their burgers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0042
rows.name:
I'm afraid they're going to eat through my entire
condiment supply![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0043
rows.name:
But aside from that, they're good customers. Hmm...
Maybe I should start placing extra-large bottles of
condiments on the tables for Ma-non use?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0058
rows.name:
We've suffered a direct attack, and the pieces of the
Lifehold are being destroyed one by one. Trust me,
there's no shortage of stressed-out folks around town.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0059
rows.name:
I have to ask: Do you think the Lifehold Core will be
okay? They're not going to destroy it, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0060
rows.name:
If they manage to get that, all of the customers who
enjoy eating in my restaurant will keel over and die,
which is going to be just horrible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0061
rows.name: So hurry up and find that Core![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask about recent developments.

rows.label: tev023401_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask what Pauline intends to do next.

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0062
rows.name:
That kid fought hard for humanity until he drew his
last breath. I should live by his example instead of
moping over his death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0063
rows.name:
I need to make more of the hamburger special he loved
so I can serve it up to exhausted BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0064
rows.name:
That's the way I can contribute to this fight.
So I'll work extra hard and use that watch I was
given as my special lucky charm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG0065
rows.name:
It's thanks to that watch that I'm able to keep going.
I'm so grateful to you and that weird Ma-non fellow.
Er, Chiopitus, was it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG1001
rows.name:
I hear we're finally going to be able to return to our
real bodies. That's wonderful news![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG1002
rows.name:
When we do, we'll need food to survive, which gives
me and my restaurant another chance to shine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG1003
rows.name:
I'll need to start preparing filling meals to sate you
hungry BLADEs, but also make sure that they're
nutritionally balanced.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023401_MSG1004
rows.name:
You can look forward to some exciting new menu
items in the near future![ST:wait ]
